name: Alolan Golem
flavorText: It fires rocks charged with electricity. Even if the rock isn't fired that accurately, just grazing an opponent will cause numbness and fainting.

attacks.name: Electromagnetic Rock Wrecker
attacks.text: Flip a coin for each Lightning Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 80 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Heavy Slam
attacks.text: This attack does 30 less damage for each Colorless in your opponent's Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost.
